admission.title: School Admission
admission.description: Fill out the Kerala HSCAP Appendix-8 form for school admission
admission.tapToStart: Tap here to start a new application
admission.startDescription: Start filling out your school admission form
admission.pdfNotAvailableHint: Generate it from the form (Preview PDF) or try again later.
admission.pdfNotGeneratedYet: PDF has not been generated yet. Use Preview PDF in the form first.

step1.title: Qualifying Examination
step1.examCodeHelp: Enter the code of your qualifying examination.
step1.examNameHelp: Select the board/exam name that you studied under.
step1.registerNumberHelp: Enter your register number exactly as on the hall ticket.
step1.passingMonthHelp: Enter the month you passed the examination.
step1.passingYearHelp: Enter the year you passed the examination.
step1.schoolCodeHelp: Enter the code of the school where you studied SSLC/equivalent.
step1.schoolCodeInfoBody: Use the official school code/UDISE code if available. If you are unsure, you can ask the AI assistant to help you find the code and then verify it from the official list.
step1.schoolNameHelp: Enter the full school name (as in official records).
step1.passedBoardExamHelp: Turn on if you have already passed the board exam.

step2.title: Applicant Details
step2.name: Name (Block letters)
step2.nameHelp: Enter the applicant’s name in block letters as per records.
step2.categoryHelp: Choose the reservation category applicable to the applicant.
step2.categoryCodeHelp: This is filled automatically based on the selected category.
step2.ewsEligibleHelp: Turn on only if you have a valid EWS certificate.
step2.casteHelp: Enter caste/community name as per certificate (if applicable).
step2.religionHelp: Enter religion as per records (if applicable).
step2.dateOfBirthHelp: Enter date of birth in the same format as the certificate.
step2.motherNameHelp: Enter mother’s name as per records.
step2.fatherNameHelp: Enter father’s name as per records.
step2.guardianNameHelp: If guardian is different from parents, enter the guardian’s name.

step3.title: Reservation & Special Categories
step3.oecHelp: Turn on only if the applicant belongs to OEC.
step3.linguisticMinorityHelp: Turn on if the applicant claims linguistic minority.
step3.linguisticLanguageHelp: If linguistic minority is selected, mention the language.
step3.differentlyAbledHelp: Select the disability type(s) that apply to the applicant.
step3.differentlyAbledPercentageHelp: Enter the disability percentage as per certificate (0–100).

step4.title: Residence & Address
step4.nativeCountryHelp: If native state is not Kerala, enter the country (optional).
step4.permanentPinCodeHelp: Enter the 6-digit PIN code for permanent address.
step4.communicationAddressHelp: Enter the address for receiving communications.
step4.communicationPinCodeHelp: Enter the 6-digit PIN code for communication address.

step5.title: Grace / Bonus Marks
step5.graceMarksHelp: Turn on if grace/bonus marks are applicable.
step5.nccHelp: Turn on if you have NCC participation/certificate.
step5.scoutsHelp: Turn on if you have Scouts/Guides participation.
step5.spcHelp: Turn on if you have SPC participation.
step5.defenceDependentHelp: Turn on if you are eligible under defence dependent category.
step5.littleKitesGradeHelp: Enter your Little Kites grade (if applicable).

step6.title: Sports Participation
step6.stateCountHelp: Enter the number of state-level sports achievements.
step6.districtFirstHelp: Enter how many district 1st place achievements.
step6.districtSecondHelp: Enter how many district 2nd place achievements.
step6.districtThirdHelp: Enter how many district 3rd place achievements.

step7.title: Kalolsavam
step7.stateCountHelp: Enter the number of state-level Kalolsavam participations.
step7.districtAHelp: Enter how many district A grades.
step7.districtBHelp: Enter how many district B grades.
step7.districtCHelp: Enter how many district C grades.

step8.title: Scholarships
step8.ntseHelp: Turn on if you have NTSE qualification.
step8.nmmsHelp: Turn on if you have NMMS qualification.
step8.ussHelp: Turn on if you have USS qualification.
step8.lssHelp: Turn on if you have LSS qualification.

step9.title: Co-curricular
step9.fairGradesHelp: Enter the number of A–E grades you won in each fair.
step9.clubsHelp: Select clubs/activities in which the applicant participated.

step10.title: SSLC Attempts & Marks
step10.attemptsHelp: Select how many times you attempted SSLC.
step10.previousAttemptsHelp: Enter details for each previous attempt (if any).
step10.subjectGradesHelp: Enter the grades for each subject as per marksheet.

step11.title: School & Combination Preferences
step11.schoolCodeHelp: Enter the preferred school code for this option.
step11.combinationCodeHelp: Enter the course/combination code for this option.
step11.addPreferenceHelp: Add another preference (up to the allowed limit).

step12.title: Document Upload
step12.uploadDocumentHelp: Upload a clear photo or PDF of the document.
step12.requiredBecauseCategory: Required because you selected a category.
step12.requiredBecauseReservation: Required because you indicated EWS or reservation.
step12.requiredBecauseSports: Required because you indicated sports participation.
step12.requiredBecauseKalolsavam: Required because you indicated Kalolsavam participation.
step12.requiredBecauseScholarship: Required because you indicated scholarship qualification.
step12.requiredBecauseDisability: Required because you indicated differently abled.

step13.title: Declaration & Preview
step13.disclaimer: I understand that this app assists form filling; final admission depends on HSCAP.
step13.acceptDisclaimerHelp: This is required to submit the application.
step13.previewPDFHelp: Preview the generated application PDF before final submission.
step13.finalSubmitHelp: Submit the application after completing payment and declaration.
